scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Love Me, Love Me, Love Me'.
scenes.song_name: Love Me, Love Me, Love Me

scenes.description: Nerissa confronts Shiori after her performance.

subtitles.original: Grow as you may but the necklace will stay just as small as the day it was found.
subtitles.english: Grow as you may but the necklace will stay just as small as the day it was found.

subtitles.original: It's so suffocating, the endless placating, no one is, no one is ever enough.
subtitles.english: It's so suffocating, the endless placating, no one is, no one is ever enough.

subtitles.original: Won't lose to anyone, always rank number one, aren't you a beautiful child?
subtitles.english: Won't lose to anyone, always rank number one, aren't you a beautiful child?

subtitles.original: Hey! I'm better than her, I'm better than him, oh, everyone come round and gawk at perfection.
subtitles.english: Hey! I'm better than her, I'm better than him, oh, everyone come round and gawk at perfection.

subtitles.original: Meeting you right after school, I'm finally confessing to you.
subtitles.english: Meeting you right after school, I'm finally confessing to you.

subtitles.original: Ain't it too good to be true?
subtitles.english: Ain't it too good to be true?

subtitles.original: A girl like me in love with you, who's miserable, vulgar and crude.
subtitles.english: A girl like me in love with you, who's miserable, vulgar and crude.

subtitles.original: Give me your love, all of your love, give me your love...
subtitles.english: Give me your love, all of your love, give me your love...

subtitles.original: ...you can have everything if I have you.
subtitles.english: ...you can have everything if I have you.

subtitles.original: I can have you, shoulder my load, now yours to behold.
subtitles.english: I can have you, shoulder my load, now yours to behold.

subtitles.original: Still not enough, you're not enough.
subtitles.english: Still not enough, you're not enough.

subtitles.original: Never enough, still I won't lose in my old...
subtitles.english: Never enough, still I won't lose in my old...

subtitles.original: Truly I'm so sorry.
subtitles.english: Truly I'm so sorry.

subtitles.original: Give me your love, all of your love, give me your love...
subtitles.english: Give me your love, all of your love, give me your love...

subtitles.original: ...all you can conjure up.
subtitles.english: ...all you can conjure up.

subtitles.original: Give me your love, all of your love, till you go mad with ecstasy.
subtitles.english: Give me your love, all of your love, till you go mad with ecstasy.

subtitles.original: I know it hurts, only gets worse.
subtitles.english: I know it hurts, only gets worse.

subtitles.original: God how it hurts, soon you'll be craving the pain.
subtitles.english: God how it hurts, soon you'll be craving the pain.

subtitles.original: This is my happiness!
subtitles.english: This is my happiness!

subtitles.original: Is this my happiness?
subtitles.english: Is this my happiness?

subtitles.original: Did you enjoy my lovely song?
subtitles.english: Did you enjoy my lovely song?

subtitles.original: I hope you did.
subtitles.english: I hope you did.

subtitles.original: It was for you, after all.
subtitles.english: It was for you, after all.

subtitles.original: But... why are you not smiling?
subtitles.english: But... why are you not smiling?

subtitles.original: Are you not happy to see me?
subtitles.english: Are you not happy to see me?

subtitles.original: Well...
subtitles.english: Well...

subtitles.original: Say something. Answer me!
subtitles.english: Say something. Answer me!

subtitles.original: Who... who are you?
subtitles.english: Who... who are you?

subtitles.original: What?
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: You don't know who I am?
subtitles.english: You don't know who I am?

subtitles.original: But everyone knows. You are the one that released me, right?
subtitles.english: But everyone knows. You are the one that released me, right?

subtitles.original: I'm... I'm sorry.
subtitles.english: I'm... I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: You're sorry? For what? For releasing me?
subtitles.english: You're sorry? For what? For releasing me?

subtitles.original: No, no, no.
subtitles.english: No, no, no.

subtitles.original: For upsetting you.
subtitles.english: For upsetting you.

subtitles.original: If I said something wrong, I apologize.
subtitles.english: If I said something wrong, I apologize.

subtitles.original: Apologize?
subtitles.english: Apologize?

subtitles.original: You who should be amongst my most dearest and beloved followers...
subtitles.english: You who should be amongst my most dearest and beloved followers...

subtitles.original: ...who has freed me from that prison...
subtitles.english: ...who has freed me from that prison...

subtitles.original: ...who has shown me your love above all others.
subtitles.english: ...who has shown me your love above all others.

subtitles.original: You then act like you don't even know who I am?
subtitles.english: You then act like you don't even know who I am?

subtitles.original: Why would you toy with my emotions?
subtitles.english: Why would you toy with my emotions?

subtitles.original: I'm sorry, I'm not sure what you mean.
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, I'm not sure what you mean.

subtitles.original: You're not sure what I mean?
subtitles.english: You're not sure what I mean?

subtitles.original: Are you mocking me now?
subtitles.english: Are you mocking me now?

subtitles.original: If you truly do not know who I am, then why is it that you set me free?
subtitles.english: If you truly do not know who I am, then why is it that you set me free?

subtitles.original: If not for my love, and if not by your love...
subtitles.english: If not for my love, and if not by your love...

subtitles.original: ...then for what?
subtitles.english: ...then for what?

subtitles.original: Tell me the truth, and the whole truth, now!
subtitles.english: Tell me the truth, and the whole truth, now!

subtitles.original: No more lies or there will be consequences.
subtitles.english: No more lies or there will be consequences.

subtitles.original: I... I'm not lying.
subtitles.english: I... I'm not lying.

subtitles.original: I swear to you, I have no idea how I released you.
subtitles.english: I swear to you, I have no idea how I released you.

subtitles.original: I just came to a temple to collect rare spices and memories from the many books stowed away here.
subtitles.english: I just came to a temple to collect rare spices and memories from the many books stowed away here.

subtitles.original: By the gods, that's the whole truth.
subtitles.english: By the gods, that's the whole truth.

subtitles.original: Extract memories from books?
subtitles.english: Extract memories from books?

subtitles.original: Are you telling me you're a witch?
subtitles.english: Are you telling me you're a witch?

subtitles.original: How dare you step foot here!
subtitles.english: How dare you step foot here!

subtitles.original: Even knowing the long history between demons and witches, you still dare step foot here?
subtitles.english: Even knowing the long history between demons and witches, you still dare step foot here?

subtitles.original: I know how witches dare to try and bind my kind.
subtitles.english: I know how witches dare to try and bind my kind.

subtitles.original: Would you be foolish enough to dare attempt that on me?
subtitles.english: Would you be foolish enough to dare attempt that on me?

subtitles.original: Yes, okay. Yes, I'm a witch.
subtitles.english: Yes, okay. Yes, I'm a witch.

subtitles.original: But I've never... well, mostly never, tried anything like that.
subtitles.english: But I've never... well, mostly never, tried anything like that.

subtitles.original: I swear.
subtitles.english: I swear.

subtitles.original: And this time I was not led on by my nature at all. No.
subtitles.english: And this time I was not led on by my nature at all. No.

subtitles.original: This time it was an angel that told me of this place.
subtitles.english: This time it was an angel that told me of this place.

subtitles.original: An angel came to me in my dreams.
subtitles.english: An angel came to me in my dreams.
